My budget is 500 Euros a month.

Also, I am a responsible and dependable tenant, so I am confident that I will take care of the apartment and pay rent on time.

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. I understand that you have a budget of 500 Euros a month, and I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

As for the minimum rental price I am willing to accept, I am looking for someone who is willing to pay at least 600 Euros a month. However, I am open to discussing the rental price with you further and finding a compromise.

In terms of requirements for the tenant, I would like someone who is responsible and dependable, as you mentioned. I would also like someone who is able to pay rent on time and take care of the apartment in good condition.

As for the apartment, it is located in the heart of the city and is 25 square meters in size. It is in good condition and comes with a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable bed, and a small dining area.

I hope this information is helpful, and please let me know if you have any further questions or if you are interested in discussing the rental price with me.
name: Heinrich Heine
